Package com.tiyb.tev.controller

Class TEVPostRestController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tiyb.tev.controller.TEVPostRestController
  • @RestController
@RequestMapping("/api")
public class TEVPostRestController
extends Object

    This is the REST controller for working with Post data, including special kinds of posts such as "regular" and "photo" posts.

    Note: The APIs listed here are all blog-specific, even in cases where the blog name shouldn't be necessary. e.g. retrieving a Post by ID shouldn't require a blog name to be specified (there is no reason to assume IDs are not unique across blogs), but the APIs require blog names even in these cases, for consistency.

    Author:
    tiyb

    • Method Detail

      • getAllPostsForBlog

        @GetMapping("/posts/{blog}")
public List<Post> getAllPostsForBlog​(@PathVariable("blog")
                                     String blog)
        GET request for listing all posts for a given blog
        Parameters:
        blog - Blog for which posts should be retrieved
        Returns:
        List of all posts in the database

      • createPostForBlog

        @PostMapping("/posts/{blog}")
public Post createPostForBlog​(@PathVariable("blog")
                              String blog,
                              @Valid @RequestBody
                              @Valid Post post)
        POST request to submit a Tumblr post into the system for a given blog
        Parameters:
        blog - Name of the blog for which the Post should be inserted
        post - The Post object (in JSON format) to be saved into the database
        Returns:
        The same Post object that was saved (including the ID)

      • getPostForBlogById

        @GetMapping("/posts/{blog}/{id}")
public Post getPostForBlogById​(@PathVariable("blog")
                               String blog,
                               @PathVariable("id")
                               String postId)
        GET to return a single post by ID for a given Blog.
        Parameters:
        blog - Name of the blog for the post (not used)
        postId - The Post ID
        Returns:
        The Post details

      • updatePostForBlog

        @PutMapping("/posts/{blog}/{id}")
public Post updatePostForBlog​(@PathVariable("blog")
                              String blog,
                              @PathVariable("id")
                              String postId,
                              @RequestBody
                              Post postDetails)
        PUT to update a Post for a given blog
        Parameters:
        blog - The blog for which this post should be updated (not used, but needs to be consistent with blog specified in Post)
        postId - The ID of the post to be updated
        postDetails - The data to be updated
        Returns:
        The same Post object that was submitted

      • markPostReadForBlog

        @GetMapping("/posts/{blog}/{id}/markRead")
public Post markPostReadForBlog​(@PathVariable("blog")
                                String blog,
                                @PathVariable("id")
                                String postId)
        PUT API for marking a post read for a given blog
        Parameters:
        blog - Blog for which this post should be marked read (must be consistent with the post from the DB)
        postId - The ID of the post to be marked read
        Returns:
        The modified Post

public Post markPostFavouriteForBlog​(@PathVariable("blog")

                                     String postId)
        PUT API to mark a post as a favourite for a given blog
        Parameters:
        blog - Validated against post in DB
        postId - The ID of the post to be marked as a favourite
        Returns:
        The modified Post

        @DeleteMapping("/posts/{blog}/{id}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> deletePostForBlog​(@PathVariable("blog")
                                                                    String blog,
                                                                    @PathVariable("id")
                                                                    String postId)
        DEL to delete a single post by ID for a given blog
        Parameters:
        blog - Validated against DB
        postId - the ID of the post to be deleted
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity with the response details

      • deleteAllPostsForBlog

@DeleteMapping("/posts/{blog}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> deleteAllPostsForBlog​(@PathVariable("blog")
                                                                        String blog)
        DEL to delete all posts in the DB for a given blog
        Parameters:
        blog - Blog for which posts should be deleted
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity with the response details
